Review Text: The integration with my bank was seamless, but I wish I could have more control over my transaction limits within the app. Overall, I’m satisfied. However, there are areas that could be improved.
Overall, it’s a solid app, but I’d like to see a better integration with banking systems to simplify transfers. However, there are areas that could be improved.
This app has been my primary money management tool. I find it very convenient, but there are times when the app freezes, which is frustrating. However, there are areas that could be improved.
Cash App is pretty good for transfering money, but it can be a little slow when receiving funds. I hope they can improve that in the next update.
I've enjoyed using Cash App! It’s user-friendly, but I think it could benefit from additional features to make it even more versatile.
